AddExistedNodes.title: AddExistedNodes
AddExistedNodes.summary: Adds one or more existing ECS instances as compute nodes to a specified cluster.

AddLocalNodes.title: AddLocalNodes
AddLocalNodes.summary: Adds local nodes to a specified cluster on hybrid cloud or cluster on the cloud.

AddNodes.title: AddNodes
AddNodes.summary: Adds one or more compute nodes to an E-HPC cluster.

AddQueue.title: AddQueue
AddQueue.summary: Creates a queue for a cluster.

AddSecurityGroup.title: AddSecurityGroup
AddSecurityGroup.summary: Adds a cluster to a security group.

ApplyNodes.title: ApplyNodes
ApplyNodes.summary: Adds pay-as-you-go or preemptible compute nodes to a cluster.

CreateCluster.title: CreateCluster
CreateCluster.summary: Creates a pay-as-you-go or subscription E-HPC cluster.

DeleteNodes.title: DeleteNodes
DeleteNodes.summary: Deletes one or more compute nodes from a cluster.

DeleteQueue.title: DeleteQueue
DeleteQueue.summary: Deletes a queue in a cluster.

DeleteSecurityGroup.title: DeleteSecurityGroup
DeleteSecurityGroup.summary: Removes a cluster from a specified security group.

DescribeAutoScaleConfig.title: DescribeAutoScaleConfig
DescribeAutoScaleConfig.summary: Queries the auto scaling settings of a cluster.

DescribeCluster.title: DescribeCluster
DescribeCluster.summary: Queries the details of a cluster.

DescribeImagePrice.title: DescribeImagePrice
DescribeImagePrice.summary: Queries the price of an Alibaba Cloud Marketplace image.

DescribeJob.title: DescribeJob
DescribeJob.summary: Queries the information about a job in an E-HPC cluster.

DescribePrice.title: DescribePrice
DescribePrice.summary: Queries the pricing information of a cluster.

DescribeServerlessJobs.title: DescribeServerlessJobs
DescribeServerlessJobs.summary: Queries the details of a serverless job by job ID or subtask ID (array job). You can specify only a single job ID or a single subtask ID at a time.

GetAccountingReport.title: GetAccountingReport
GetAccountingReport.summary: Queries the resource report information of a specified cluster.

GetAutoScaleConfig.title: GetAutoScaleConfig
GetAutoScaleConfig.summary: Obtains the auto scaling settings of a cluster.

GetCloudMetricLogs.title: GetCloudMetricLogs
GetCloudMetricLogs.summary: Reads performance metrics (CloudMetrics) logs of E-HPC.

GetCloudMetricProfiling.title: GetCloudMetricProfiling
GetCloudMetricProfiling.summary: Queries the profiling result of a cluster.

GetClusterVolumes.title: GetClusterVolumes
GetClusterVolumes.summary: Queries the information of the NAS file system mounted to a specified cluster.

GetHybridClusterConfig.title: GetHybridClusterConfig
GetHybridClusterConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of a specified hybrid cloud cluster or a specified compute node.

GetIfEcsTypeSupportHtConfig.title: GetIfEcsTypeSupportHtConfig
GetIfEcsTypeSupportHtConfig.summary: Queries whether hyper-threading can be enabled or disabled for an instance type.

GetJobLog.title: GetJobLog
GetJobLog.summary: Queries the output logs of a job.

GetPostScripts.title: GetPostScripts
GetPostScripts.summary: Queries the post-processing scripts of a cluster.

GetSchedulerInfo.title: GetSchedulerInfo
GetSchedulerInfo.summary: Queries the scheduler settings of a cluster.

GetVisualServiceStatus.title: GetVisualServiceStatus
GetVisualServiceStatus.summary: Queries the status of the VNC service in a cluster.

InitializeEHPC.title: InitializeEHPC
InitializeEHPC.summary: Creates a service-linked role for Elastic High Performance Computing (E-HPC). A service-linked role is required for you to use E-HPC.

InvokeShellCommand.title: InvokeShellCommand
InvokeShellCommand.summary: Runs interactive commands in a cluster node.

ListAvailableEcsTypes.title: ListAvailableEcsTypes
ListAvailableEcsTypes.summary: Queries available Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance types.

ListCloudMetricProfilings.title: ListCloudMetricProfilings
ListCloudMetricProfilings.summary: Queries the profiling history of a cluster.

ListClusterLogs.title: ListClusterLogs
ListClusterLogs.summary: Queries the operation logs of a cluster within the last three days.

ListClusters.title: ListClusters
ListClusters.summary: Queries all Elastic High Performance Computing (E-HPC) clusters of the current account in each region.

ListClustersMeta.title: ListClustersMeta
ListClustersMeta.summary: Queries the list of cluster metadata.

ListCommands.title: ListCommands
ListCommands.summary: Queries the interactive commands in a specified cluster.

ListCommunityImages.title: ListCommunityImages
ListCommunityImages.summary: Queries a list of community images.

ListCpfsFileSystems.title: ListCpfsFileSystems
ListCpfsFileSystems.summary: Queries the information about Cloud Paralleled File System (CPFS) and its mount targets.

ListCurrentClientVersion.title: ListCurrentClientVersion
ListCurrentClientVersion.summary: Query the latest version number of the cluster client (ehpcutil).

ListCustomImages.title: ListCustomImages
ListCustomImages.summary: Queries custom images and shared images supported by Elastic High Performance Computing (E-HPC).

ListFileSystemWithMountTargets.title: ListFileSystemWithMountTargets
ListFileSystemWithMountTargets.summary: Queries file systems and mount targets.

ListImages.title: ListImages
ListImages.summary: Queries the list of images that can be installed in a cluster.

ListInstalledSoftware.title: ListInstalledSoftware
ListInstalledSoftware.summary: Queries the software that is installed in a cluster.

ListInvocationResults.title: ListInvocationResults
ListInvocationResults.summary: Queries the result of an interactive command in a cluster.

ListInvocationStatus.title: ListInvocationStatus
ListInvocationStatus.summary: Queries the status of an interactive command.

ListJobTemplates.title: ListJobTemplates
ListJobTemplates.summary: Queries the list of job templates.

ListJobs.title: ListJobs
ListJobs.summary: Queries the list of jobs in a cluster.

ListJobsWithFilters.title: ListJobsWithFilters
ListJobsWithFilters.summary: Queries the details of a specified job.

ListNodes.title: ListNodes
ListNodes.summary: Queries the list of nodes in a cluster.

ListNodesByQueue.title: ListNodesByQueue
ListNodesByQueue.summary: Queries the node information of a single cluster within an Alibaba Cloud account by queue.

ListNodesNoPaging.title: ListNodesNoPaging
ListNodesNoPaging.summary: Queries the information of all nodes in a specified cluster on one page.

ListPreferredEcsTypes.title: ListPreferredEcsTypes
ListPreferredEcsTypes.summary: Queries the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance types recommended by Elastic High Performance Computing (E-HPC).

ListQueues.title: ListQueues
ListQueues.summary: Queries the queues of a specified cluster.

ListRegions.title: ListRegions
ListRegions.summary: Queries a list of regions where Elastic High Performance Computing (E-HPC) is supported.

ListSecurityGroups.title: ListSecurityGroups
ListSecurityGroups.summary: Queries the security groups that are assigned to an E-HPC cluster.

ListServerlessJobs.title: ListServerlessJobs
ListServerlessJobs.summary: Queries the list of serverless jobs based on filter conditions.

ListSoftwares.title: ListSoftwares
ListSoftwares.summary: Queries the list of software that can be installed in a cluster.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are attached to a specified resource.

ListTasks.title: ListTasks
ListTasks.summary: Queries the response of an asynchronous API operation for a cluster.

ListUpgradeClients.title: ListUpgradeClients
ListUpgradeClients.summary: Queries the latest version to which the client (ehpcutil) in a cluster can be updated and historical update records of the client.

ListUsers.title: ListUsers
ListUsers.summary: Queries all users of a cluster.

ListUsersAsync.title: ListUsersAsync
ListUsersAsync.summary: Queries the users in a cluster.

ListVolumes.title: ListVolumes
ListVolumes.summary: Queries the file systems mounted on Elastic High Performance Computing (E-HPC) clusters.

ModifyClusterAttributes.title: ModifyClusterAttributes
ModifyClusterAttributes.summary: Modifies the basic information of a cluster, including the name, description, and image.

ModifyUserGroups.title: ModifyUserGroups
ModifyUserGroups.summary: Changes the user group to which users belong.

ModifyVisualServicePasswd.title: ModifyVisualServicePasswd
ModifyVisualServicePasswd.summary: Sets a password that you can use to remotely connect to a visualization service in a cluster over the virtual network console (VNC).

ResetNodes.title: ResetNodes
ResetNodes.summary: Resets one or more compute nodes.

RunCloudMetricProfiling.title: RunCloudMetricProfiling
RunCloudMetricProfiling.summary: Starts the profiling process of a cluster.

SetAutoScaleConfig.title: SetAutoScaleConfig
SetAutoScaleConfig.summary: Configures the auto scaling settings of a cluster.

SetPostScripts.title: SetPostScripts
SetPostScripts.summary: Configures the post-processing scripts of a cluster.

SetQueue.title: SetQueue
SetQueue.summary: Moves compute nodes from a queue to another queue.

SetSchedulerInfo.title: SetSchedulerInfo
SetSchedulerInfo.summary: Configures the scheduler settings of a cluster.

StartNodes.title: StartNodes
StartNodes.summary: Starts one or more nodes in a cluster.

StartVisualService.title: StartVisualService
StartVisualService.summary: Starts the Virtual Network Console (VNC) Remote visualization service in a specified cluster.

StopJobs.title: StopJobs
StopJobs.summary: Stops one or more jobs in a cluster.

StopNodes.title: StopNodes
StopNodes.summary: Stops one or more nodes in an Elastic High Performance Computing (E-HPC) cluster.

StopServerlessJobs.title: StopServerlessJobs
StopServerlessJobs.summary: Stops Serverless jobs in a cluster based on job IDs or subtask IDs (array jobs). If you specify the job ID of an array job, all subtasks in the job are stopped.

StopVisualService.title: StopVisualService
StopVisualService.summary: Stops the remote visualization service of Virtual Network Console (VNC) in a cluster.

SubmitJob.title: SubmitJob
SubmitJob.summary: Submits a job in a cluster.

SubmitServerlessJob.title: SubmitServerlessJob
SubmitServerlessJob.summary: Submits a serverless job to an Elastic High Performance Computing (E-HPC) cluster.

SyncUsers.title: SyncUsers
SyncUsers.summary: Synchronizes local cluster users to a hybrid cloud cluster in hybrid-cloud proxy mode.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates tags and attach the tags to a specified resource.

UnTagResources.title: UnTagResources
UnTagResources.summary: Removes tags from a specified resource.

UpdateClusterVolumes.title: UpdateClusterVolumes
UpdateClusterVolumes.summary: Mount new storage resources to a cluster.

UpdateQueueConfig.title: UpdateQueueConfig
UpdateQueueConfig.summary: Updates the resource group information and the instance types of compute nodes for a queue of a cluster.

UpgradeClient.title: UpgradeClient
UpgradeClient.summary: Updates the client (ehpcutil) in a cluster to a new version.
